#### Basic Example

```{r}
library(plotly)

fig <-  plot_ly(
  type = 'scatter',
  x = mtcars$hp,
  y = mtcars$qsec,
  text = rownames(mtcars),
  hoverinfo = 'text',
  mode = 'markers',
  transforms = list(
    list(
      type = 'filter',
      target = 'y',
      operation = '>',
      value = mean(mtcars$qsec)
    )
  )
)

fig
```
